__e: {\pos(192,240)}I know that it took me a little while to come around, and it's still a little weird to get used to, but... you obviously make my mom very happy.
Anyhow, if you and John wished a job on me, I guess I gotta take it and do the best I can with it.
I'm not God... but we know what this country's like now, and we can't accept it, and we can't wait for God to come and change it.
You have a choice to accept it as a truth and completely ignore what may be going on inside of you that may be saying something different.
It's part of your job to walk through it anyway.
If you want to stick with me"..." That's the long and short of it.
